TopicTitle: PSA re-entry on Tylo is impossible

Articles.Content: Seriously my chutes never deploy
Did you just

[quote name='selfish_meme']Seriously my chutes never deploy[/QUOTE]
I'm pretty sure you just voided your chute warranty.
I literally can't even.
Not even as much.
Since Tylo has no atmosphere chutes will not work as intended. You must first install them in a reverse configuration.
PSA: Never use parachutes. They are total rubbish except for special situtions on bodies with lots of gasses floating around.
Aim for Tylo's lakes so parachute is not needed

[quote name='selfish_meme']Seriously my chutes never deploy[/QUOTE]

Have you tried swearing at them? I find it helps.

Cupcake...
OP's username checks out. :P
Put a bunch of illuminati onto your ship, and you'll land softly everywhere
I should have said it is unpossible

[quote name='selfish_meme']Seriously my chutes never deploy[/QUOTE]
Epic LOL, just Epic

HAHA YES!
This thread is officially hilarious. Re-entry on Tylo IS impossible!

'Course I'm much more concerned with how in 1.0.5 it's impossible to land on Jool now. ;p

Whoosh! Low flying missed pun!
Try airbags, they can slow you down in Tylo's lithosphere without overgeeing. Maybe.
Hey guys, you know what, 1.0.5 made reentry on the sun [U]more[/U] impossible than it used to.:cool:

Can confirm, OP. Chutes never seem to deploy before I get to the visible part of the atmosphere, and when I get there, everything overheats and explodes instantly! It's like that layer of gray clouds is made out of solid rock or something. I wish the devs would fix this, I'm doing everything right but I still explode. :mad:

[quote name='jhousen'][SIZE=4][I][U][B]Epic[/B][/U][/I][/SIZE] LOL, just [SIZE=4][I][U][B]Epic[/B][/U][/I][/SIZE][/QUOTE]
What is this, 2008?

[quote name='Thegamer211']What is this, 2008?[/QUOTE]

Everything is Awesome!

I have been succesful in lithospheric re-entry at Tylo several times.
Maybe you should try adding more heat shields?

Chutes never seem to deploy before I get to the visible part of the atmosphere, and when I get there, everything overheats and explodes instantly! It's like that layer of gray clouds is made out of solid rock or something. I wish the devs would fix this, I'm doing everything right but I still explode. [/QUOTE][/FONT]

Yeah, I heard they did that because they wanted to punish players for yelling about clouds all the time, so they added clouds. Hard clouds!

[quote name='Thegamer211']What is this, 2008?[/QUOTE]

All your base are belong to us!

...But yeah, this is a very important bug and should be fixed; I notice it happens all the time on other bodies too; why just the other day I was trying to aerobrake on the Mun and it didn't work. I tried it on Minmus and it didn't work there either; oddly enough it worked on Duna, I think this is unintentional behavior. I swear, this makes landing on those bodies literally impossible, it'd take [I]way[/I] too much Delta-V to orbit AND land with rockets. Looks like there will be a 1.0.6 soon! [SIZE=1]/s[/SIZE]
That's weird, my parachutes work fine on Tylo :confused:
